overview:
Elias is the Director of Business Development for Common Sense, with over 20 years of marketing and advertising experience, he is passionate about results driven marketing. He is focused on helping companies build powerful, long-lasting relationships with their customers through the use of Doppler, which is Common Sense’s proprietary e-mail marketing application.

Doppler sends- e-blasts and tracks who opts into the e-mails, the time and date the e-mails are opened, who responds to the e-mail, where the viewer clicks on the message, and if the viewer reads the English or other language version of the e-mail. The power of Doppler is in providing consumer personalization and segmentation in the e-mail blasts so the message resonates, to the fullest, with the consumer/customer, thus tracking the results of the e-mail campaign and a measurable ROI (Return on Investment), which of course is the bottom line .

Additionally, Elias helps companies simplify business processes through custom software development products offered by Common Sense. He is highly committed to helping business grow and expand using results-oriented, measurable marketing techniques that increase both branding and revenues for clients.
